Title: XX.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Jonathan E. Steinberg, Brad Kane, Marc Berzenski (staff writer), Lisa Schultz Boyd (staff writer), Joshua Rothenberger (staff writer)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: After declining Captain Hornigold's "pardons", Captain Flint and his crew will test their fate; Vane runs into an old friend; Eleanor and Woodes Rogers continue their journey.
